name: Hot Potato: Family Party Game
description:
The Perfect Game for Family Game Night!

We took the classic Hot Potato idea, and turned it on its head. We added questions, math, physical challenges, and more! You have to do what the game says before you can pass it.

Answer questions like...

-List 3 Things You Can Get at Taco Bell
-Name 3 Kinds of Sandwiches
-Tell Us 2 Things About Albert Einstein
-Explain Harry Potter as Fast As You Can

Over 1,000 Challenges in the Full Version!

You get the idea!

Download it for FREE today!
